name: @e-state/core
description: A simple global state management library

scripts.p: tsc && jest && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && ../scripts/update-dependencies.sh
scripts.p:react: tsc && jest && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && ../scripts/update-and-publish.sh
scripts.p:minor: tsc && jest && npm version minor && npm publish --access public && ../scripts/update-dependencies.sh
scripts.p:major: tsc && jest && npm version major && npm publish --access public && ../scripts/update-dependencies.sh

author: Shu Nagumo
